description: Jabra Biz 2300 USB MS Headsets or equivalent for Royal Canadian Mounted Police
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
### Solicitation Information

* **Notice Title**: SSC 2BH2129384/A - Jabra Biz 2300 USB MS Headsets or equivalent for Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* **Solicitation No**: 2BH2129384/A
* **Department**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

### Request for Quotation (RFQ) Information

* **Description of Requirement**: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police requires 1000 Jabra Biz 2300 USB Mono MS PTT Headsets and Noise Cancelling Microphones, as well as 1000 Jabra Biz 2300 USB Stereo MS PTT Headsets and Noise Cancelling Microphones.
* **Delivery Destination**: Ottawa, Ontario
* **Delivery Date**: 60 federal government working days from contract award
* **Security Requirements**: None
* **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA)**: None
* **Procurement Process**: Bids must be submitted through the Procurement 2 Procurement (P2P) portal by the closing date and time specified.

### Contact Information

* **Procurement Officer**: Michael Boualavong, Junior Procurement Officer, Shared Services Canada. 
    * Email: [michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
    * Phone: (613) 402-8895

### Links to the Tender Documents

Please access the solicitation and submit your bid through the P2P portal here: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https:// supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)

Please do not hesitate to contact Michael Boualavong should you
